attributes.action: Stop murderer getting sex change on NHS and payed for by tax payers!
attributes.additional_details: My uncle was brutally murdered by trio Paris Green, Kevin Mcdonaugh and Dean Smith. Paris who was actually born Peter was sentenced to 18 years in a woman's prison although he is still a man is set to undergo his life long dream of a full gender realignment. Myself and I'm sure many others agree that this is ridiculous, he should not be rewarded for committing such a brutal crime. Please help us get get justice for my my uncle Robert!
